unnormalised: कोणें तरी म्हाका कोरमंगला, बंगळूर हांगा पीजी सोदचे विशीं टिप्स विचारल्यो. बरी जागा सोदप म्हळ्यार खूब साहस आशिल्लें!

text: कोणें तरी म्हाका कोरमंगला, बंगळूर हांगा पीजी सोदचे विशीं टिप्स विचारल्यो. बरी जागा सोदप म्हळ्यार खूब साहस आशिल्लें!

unnormalised: Mhaka poilem Christ College-achea lagim passarun sodh korun gheto, kiteak mhozo ixtt thõi xikta. Maka thõichi thoddi address-am lixun ghetlim zoxi #45, 8th Main, 3rd Block, Koramangala 560034. Disun ailem ki zaite PG bhurgebari borobr signboards lavun dovornant. Ani websites-cher astachi mahiti puranni asta, zoxi "Uplabdh" asa 12, JNC Road, Koramangala, punn jeun hanv thõi ghelo, tem ekdum vegallo dhandho thõi aslo! Mhunnun, xerir poddun polleupak chodd gorjechem.
normalised: Mhojem poilem kam Christ College-achea lagim-lagim sondhan korun ghetlem, kiteak thõi mhozo ixtt xikta. Mhaka kainch address mell'lle, toxem number challis panch, aatvem main, tisrem block, Koramangala panch soonn soonn tin challis. Dista ki zaite P-G khore sign board launche na. Toxench, websites-cher purannem mahiti asta, toxem dakhoita ki 'Meltta' bara, J-N-C Road, Koramangala, punn jeun mhaka thõi gelo, thõi ekdum vegllo business aslo! Mhunnun, soirekken chukun dako gheunchem zaroori.

unnormalised: Hanv xiklol'lem ani ek trick mhollear hangachea chai walla nk vichop. Tankam sogllem khobor asta! Eka zonam mhaka BDA complex lagginuch ek novean ugddailelem PG asachen mhunn tip dili – Distta tem 10/A, 1st cross, 7th main, sector 6, HSR Layout, Bangalore, 560102-cher asa, punn tannem mhaka suchoilo ki tem thoddem duk asachen. Fokot online listingacher patieunakai; bore jaygi zatich tor tonddi kabarichean mellta. Tumchea sodachek bore zao!
normalised: Mhaka xikleli ani ek yukti mhunllear sthanik chai wallank vichop. Tankam sogllem khobor asta! Eklean maka B-D-A Complexachea lagim novean suru zal'lea P-G vixim tip dili - dislem tem dha slash A, poilem Cross, satvem Main, Sector six, H-S-R Layout, Bangalore, panch so so ek dha doncher asa, punn tannem maka suchoilem tem thoddem mhoorg asta mhunnon. Fokot online suchicher visvas dovor naka; chodd favo asli zago somanya votten mellta. Tumchea sodhant bori naseeb!
